con:property.con:name: SQL_GET_INPUT_DATA
con:property.con:value: SELECT MSG_TRNSMSN_ID,ORD_ID,CUST_NAM FROM CFS_INTRFC_ORD WHERE ORD_ID IN (SELECT ORDER_NUMBER FROM BLC_ORDER WHERE CUSTOMER_ID IN (SELECT CUSTOMER_ID FROM BLC_CUSTOMER WHERE USER_NAME LIKE '${Properties#testcaseid}%')) AND CFS_EVNT_ID = ${Properties#cfs_event_id} AND MSG_TRNSMSN_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DATE_CREATED DESC

con:property.con:name: getData_VOUCHER_QUERY
con:property.con:value: SELECT CFS_INTRFC_ORD.MSG_TRNSMSN_ID AS TRANSMISSION_ID, CFS_INTRFC_ORD.CFS_INTRFC_ORD_ID AS TRANSACTION_ID, TO_CHAR( BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.DATE_CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.DATE_CREATED AS TRANSMISSION_DTTM, ETS_CUST_LNKG.LNKG_KY AS SOLD_TO_CUST_ID, BLC_CUSTOMER.LAST_NAME || ',' || BLC_CUSTOMER.FIRST_NAME AS SOLD_CUST_NAME, BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE1 AS BILL_TO_ADDRESS1, DECODE(BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE2, NULL,'',BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE2) AS BILL_TO_ADDRESS2, ETS_ADR.PSTL_LN_3_ADR AS BILL_TO_ADDRESS3, ETS_ADR.PSTL_LN_4_ADR AS BILL_TO_ADDRESS4, BLC_ADDRESS.CITY, BLC_ADDRESS.STATE_PROV_REGION, BLC_ADDRESS.POSTAL_CODE, ETS_CNTRY.ISO3_CNTRY_CDE, BLC_COUNTRY.NAME, CFS_INTRFC_ORD.ORD_SEQ_NO, CFS_INTRFC_ORD.ORD_PREV_SEQ_NO, BLC_ORDER.DATE_UPDATED, PGM.PGM_ABRV_NAM, ETS_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.PSFT_PROD_ID AS PRODUCT_ID, BLC_DISCRETE_ORDER_ITEM.BASE_RETAIL_PRICE AS LIST_PRICE, BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM.QUANTITY AS QTY_ORDERED, BLC_ORDER_ITEM.PRICE*BLC_ORDER_ITEM.QUANTITY-DECODE(VCHR_PYMT.VCHR_VAL_AMT,NULL,0,VCHR_PYMT.VCHR_VAL_AMT)-DECODE(WAIVE_FEE_DTL.WAIVED_AMT,NULL,0,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.WAIVED_AMT) AS BILLED_AMT, BLC_ORDER_ITEM.PRICE*BLC_ORDER_ITEM.QUANTITY+DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM_DTL_ADJ.ADJUSTMENT_VALUE, NULL, 0,BLC_ORDER_ITEM_DTL_ADJ.ADJUSTMENT_VALUE ) AS SALE_TRANS_AMT, DECODE(BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.PAYMENT_TYPE,'ZERO_AMOUNT',BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.DATE_CREATED,PYMT_TRNSCTN.SBMTD_DTM) AS ORDLINE_TRANSACTION_DTTM, DECODE(RSCHDL_TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.ORG_TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM_ID,NULL,'NA', (SELECT BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ID FROM BLC_ORDER_ITEM WHERE ORDER_ITEM_ID = RSCHDL_TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.ORG_TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM_ID )) AS SOURCE_ORDER_ID, BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID AS SOURCE_LINE_NBR, ETS_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.PSFT_PROD_TYP_CDE AS CUSTOM_C10_A, DECODE(RSCHDL_TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.MKUP_FLG,'Y','MAKEUP',RSCHDL_TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.MKUP_FLG,'N','RESCHEDULE','FAILED') AS CUSTOM_C10_B, BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID AS CUSTOM_C20_A, RSCHDL_TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.RSCHDL_FG_ITM_ID AS CUSTOM_C20_B, BKNG.APNTMT_DT AS CUSTOM_C30_A, BKNG.APNTMT_DT AS CUSTOM_C30_B, BKNG.TST_CNTR_ID_NO AS CUSTOM_C40_A, BKNG.ETS_APNTMT_ID AS CUSTOM_C80_A, CFS_INTRFC_ORD.ORD_SEQ_NO AS TRANS_NBR, CFS_INTRFC_ORD.ORD_PREV_SEQ_NO AS TRAN_REF_NUM, PYMT_TRNSCTN.RCNCL_ID AS PAYMENT_ID, DECODE(BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.PAYMENT_TYPE,'CREDIT_CARD','CCARD','PAYPAL','PAYPAL','PAPER_CHECK','CHECK','ELECTRONIC_CHECK','ECHECK','ZERO_AMOUNT','NONE') AS PYMNT_METHOD_FLD, DECODE( (SELECT FIELD_VALUE FROM BLC_PAYINFO_ADDITIONAL_FIELDS WHERE BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.PAYMENT_ID = BLC_PAYINFO_ADDITIONAL_FIELDS.PAYMENT_ID AND FIELD_NAME ='CARD_TYPE' ),'Visa','VISA') AS CC_CARD_TYPE, DECODE(BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.PAYMENT_TYPE,'ZERO_AMOUNT',BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.DATE_CREATED,PYMT_TRNSCTN.DATE_CREATED ) AS TRANSACTION_DTTM, ABS(PYMT_TRNSCTN.AMT) AS TRANSACTION_AMT, DECODE(PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_AMT, NULL,0,PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_AMT) AS PAID_AMT_BSE, DECODE(PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_CRNCY_CDE,NULL,' ',PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_CRNCY_CDE) AS CURRENCY_CD_BSE, DECODE(PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_FGN_EXCHG_RT,NULL,0,PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_FGN_EXCHG_RT) AS FX_SPOT_RATE, PYMT_TRNSCTN.PYMT_TRNSCTN_ID AS PAY_TRANS_ID, DECODE(PYMT_TRNSCTN.PYMT_INSTRMNT_ID, NULL,'NA',PYMT_TRNSCTN.PYMT_INSTRMNT_ID) AS CHECK_NBR, DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'FEWV',VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'VCHR',BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'OFFR',NULL) AS ADJ_TYPE, DECODE(DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'FEWV',VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'VCHR',BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'OFFR',NULL),'FEWV',BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM.QUANTITY * WAIVE_FEE_DTL.WAIVED_AMT,'VCHR',VCHR_PYMT.VCHR_VAL_AMT,'OTHER',BLC_ORDER_ITEM_DTL_ADJ.ADJUSTMENT_VALUE,NULL) AS ADJUSTMENT_AMT, DECODE(DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'FEWV',VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'VCHR',BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'OFFR',NULL),'VCHR',VCHR_PYMT.VCHR_TAX_CVR_AMT,0) AS VCHR_TAX_AMT, 'N' AS TAXABLE_CD, 'USD' AS CURRENCY_CD, 0 AS ADJUSTMENT_AMT_BSE, ' ' AS CURRENCY_CD_BSE, DECODE(DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'FEWV',VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'VCHR',BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'OFFR',NULL),'VCHR',VCHR_USG.EVMS_VCHR_ID,'NA') AS OrdLineAmtAdj_VCHR_FLDVALUE, DECODE(DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'FEWV',VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'VCHR',BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'OFFR',NULL),'VCHR',VCHR_USG.EVMS_VCHR_SER_NO,'NA') AS SERIAL_ID, 'NA' AS OFFER_CODE, DECODE(DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'FEWV',VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'VCHR',BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'OFFR',NULL),'VCHR',VCHR_USG.VCHR_PSFT_PROD_ID,'NA') AS PS_PRODUCT, DECODE(DECODE(DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'FEWV',VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'VCHR',BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'OFFR',NULL),'VCHR',VCHR_PYMT_CTGRY_TYP.VCHR_PRE_PD_FLG,'NA'),'Y','Y','N') AS PREPAID_FLAG, DECODE(DECODE(DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'FEWV',VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'VCHR',BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'OFFR',NULL),'VCHR',VCHR_PYMT_CTGRY_TYP.VCHR_PST_PD_FLG,'NA'),'Y','Y','N') AS BILL_INDICATOR, DECODE(DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'FEWV',VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'VCHR',BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'OFFR',NULL),'VCHR',VCHR_USG.SPNSR_CUST_PSFT_ID,'NA') AS SPONSOR_ID, DECODE(DECODE(DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'FEWV',VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'VCHR',BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID,'OFFR',NULL),'VCHR',VCHR_PYMT_CTGRY_TYP.VCHR_PST_PD_FLG,'NA'),'Y',VCHR_USG.PO_NO,'NA') AS CUSTOMER_PO FROM BLC_ORDER, CFS_INTRFC_ORD, PYMT_TRNSCTN, ETS_CUST_LNKG, BLC_CUSTOMER, BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT, BLC_ADDRESS, ETS_ADR, BLC_COUNTRY, ETS_CNTRY, BLC_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS, BLC_ORDER_ITEM, BLC_DISCRETE_ORDER_ITEM, ETS_SKU, PGM, ETS_DSCRT_ORD_ITM, BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM, VCHR_PYMT, WAIVE_FEE_DTL, BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL, BLC_ORDER_ITEM_DTL_ADJ, TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM_BKNG, BKNG , RSCHDL_TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM ,VCHR_USG ,VCHR_PYMT_CTGRY_TYP WHERE CFS_INTRFC_ORD.ORD_ID = BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID AND BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID = PYMT_TRNSCTN.ORDER_ID (+) AND BLC_ORDER.CUSTOMER_ID = ETS_CUST_LNKG.CUSTOMER_ID AND ETS_CUST_LNKG.LNKG_TYP_CDE = 'DSPID' AND BLC_ORDER.CUSTOMER_ID = BLC_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_ID AND BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID = BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.ORDER_ID AND BLC_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS.CUSTOMER_ID =BLC_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_ID AND BLC_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_ID =BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_ID AND BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_ID = ETS_ADR.ADDRESS_ID AND BLC_ADDRESS.COUNTRY =BLC_COUNTRY.ABBREVIATION AND BLC_COUNTRY.ABBREVIATION =ETS_CNTRY.CNTRY_CDE AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ID = BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID = BLC_DISCRETE_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID AND BLC_DISCRETE_ORDER_ITEM.SKU_ID =ETS_SKU.SKU_ID AND ETS_SKU.PGM_CDE =PGM.PGM_CDE AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID =ETS_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.ORDER_ITEM_ID AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID =BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID =VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID(+) AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID =WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID(+) AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID =BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID (+) AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID = RSCHDL_TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.ORDER_ITEM_ID(+) AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL_ID =BLC_ORDER_ITEM_DTL_ADJ.ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL_ID(+) AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID = TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM_BKNG.ORDER_ITEM_ID(+) AND TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM_BKNG.BKNG_ID = BKNG.BKNG_ID (+) AND VCHR_PYMT.VCHR_USG_ID = VCHR_USG.VCHR_USG_ID AND VCHR_USG.VCHR_PYMT_CTGRY_TYP_CDE = VCHR_PYMT_CTGRY_TYP.VCHR_PYMT_CTGRY_TYP_CDE AND BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID = ${Properties#orderNumber}

con:property.con:name: get_OrdLineSchd_Data_QUERY
con:property.con:value: SELECT BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM.QUANTITY AS QTY, ETS_CNTRY.ISO3_CNTRY_CDE AS COUNTRY, BLC_COUNTRY.NAME AS COUNTRY_NAME, BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE1 AS ADDRESS1, BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE2 AS ADDRESS2, ETS_ADR.PSTL_LN_3_ADR AS ADDRESS3, ETS_ADR.PSTL_LN_4_ADR AS ADDRESS4, BLC_ADDRESS.CITY AS CITY, BLC_ADDRESS.STATE_PROV_REGION AS STATE, BLC_ADDRESS.POSTAL_CODE AS POSTAL, BLC_TAX_DETAIL.TYPE AS TAX_JURISDICTION, DECODE(ETS_TAX_DTL.TAX_JRSDTN_NAM, NULL,'NA',ETS_TAX_DTL.TAX_JRSDTN_NAM) AS TAX_JUR_NAME, BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM.TOTAL_ITEM_TAXABLE_AMOUNT AS TAX_BASIS_AMT, BLC_TAX_DETAIL.RATE AS TAX_PCT, BLC_TAX_DETAIL.AMOUNT AS TAX_AMT FROM BLC_ORDER,BLC_ORDER_ITEM,BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM, BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP,BLC_ADDRESS,BLC_COUNTRY,ETS_CNTRY,ETS_ADR,BLC_FG_ITEM_TAX_XREF,BLC_TAX_DETAIL, ETS_TAX_DTL WHERE BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID=BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ID = BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID AND BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID=BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP.ORDER_ID AND BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP.ADDRESS_ID=BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_ID AND BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_ID=ETS_ADR.ADDRESS_ID AND BLC_ADDRESS.COUNTRY=BLC_COUNTRY.ABBREVIATION AND BLC_COUNTRY.ABBREVIATION=ETS_CNTRY.CNTRY_CDE AND BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM.FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM_ID=BLC_FG_ITEM_TAX_XREF.FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM_ID AND BLC_FG_ITEM_TAX_XREF.TAX_DETAIL_ID=BLC_TAX_DETAIL.TAX_DETAIL_ID AND BLC_TAX_DETAIL.TAX_DETAIL_ID=ETS_TAX_DTL.TAX_DETAIL_ID AND BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID = ${Properties#orderNumber}

con:property.con:name: getData_TestPrep
con:property.con:value: SELECT CFS_INTRFC_ORD.MSG_TRNSMSN_ID AS TRANSMISSION_ID, CFS_INTRFC_ORD.CFS_INTRFC_ORD_ID AS TRANSACTION_ID, TO_CHAR(PYMT_TRNSCTN.SBMTD_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, PYMT_TRNSCTN.SBMTD_DTM AS TRANSMISSION_DTTM, ETS_CUST_LNKG.LNKG_KY AS SOLD_TO_CUST_ID, BLC_CUSTOMER.LAST_NAME || ',' || BLC_CUSTOMER.FIRST_NAME AS SOLD_CUST_NAME, BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE1 AS BILL_TO_ADDRESS1, DECODE(BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE2, NULL,'',BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE2) AS BILL_TO_ADDRESS2, ETS_ADR.PSTL_LN_3_ADR AS BILL_TO_ADDRESS3, ETS_ADR.PSTL_LN_4_ADR AS BILL_TO_ADDRESS4, BLC_ADDRESS.CITY AS BILL_TO_CITY, ' ' AS BILL_TO_COUNTY, BLC_ADDRESS.STATE_PROV_REGION AS BILL_TO_STATE, BLC_ADDRESS.POSTAL_CODE AS BILL_TO_POSTAL, ETS_CNTRY.ISO3_CNTRY_CDE AS BILL_TO_COUNTRY, BLC_COUNTRY.NAME AS BILL_TO_COUNTRY_NAME, ' ' AS BILL_TO_GEO_CODE , 'NA' AS ORD_HDR_CUSTOM_10_A, DECODE( ETS_CUST.CUST_TYP_CDE,'ORG','INSTITUTN','INDIVIDUAL') AS ORD_HDR_CUSTOM_10_B, CFS_INTRFC_ORD.ORD_SEQ_NO AS ORD_HDR_CUSTOM_30_B, CFS_INTRFC_ORD.ORD_PREV_SEQ_NO AS ORD_HDR_CUSTOM_40_A, BLC_ORDER.DATE_UPDATED AS ORD_HDR_CUSTOM_DTTM_A, PGM.PGM_ABRV_NAM AS PROGRAM_NAME, ETS_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.PSFT_PROD_ID AS PRODUCT_ID, BLC_ORDER_ITEM.PRICE AS LIST_PRICE, BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM.QUANTITY AS QTY_ORDERED, BLC_ORDER_ITEM.PRICE*BLC_ORDER_ITEM.QUANTITY-DECODE(VCHR_PYMT.VCHR_VAL_AMT,NULL,0,VCHR_PYMT.VCHR_VAL_AMT)-DECODE(WAIVE_FEE_DTL.WAIVED_AMT,NULL,0,WAIVE_FEE_DTL.WAIVED_AMT) AS BILLED_AMT, BLC_ORDER_ITEM.PRICE*BLC_ORDER_ITEM.QUANTITY+DECODE(BLC_ORDER_ITEM_DTL_ADJ.ADJUSTMENT_VALUE, NULL, 0,BLC_ORDER_ITEM_DTL_ADJ.ADJUSTMENT_VALUE ) AS SALE_TRANS_AMT, BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID AS SOURCE_LINE_NBR, ETS_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.PSFT_PROD_TYP_CDE AS CUSTOM_C10_A, BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID AS CUSTOM_C20_A, DECODE(BKNG.APNTMT_DT,NULL,'NA',BKNG.APNTMT_DT) AS CUSTOM_C30_A, DECODE( BKNG.TST_CNTR_ID_NO,NULL,'NA', BKNG.TST_CNTR_ID_NO) AS CUSTOM_C40_A, DECODE( BKNG.ETS_APNTMT_ID,NULL,' ', BKNG.ETS_APNTMT_ID) AS CUSTOM_C80_A,CFS_INTRFC_ORD.ORD_SEQ_NO AS TRANS_NBR, CFS_INTRFC_ORD.ORD_PREV_SEQ_NO AS TRAN_REF_NUM, PYMT_TRNSCTN.RCNCL_ID AS PAYMENT_ID, DECODE(BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.PAYMENT_TYPE,'CREDIT_CARD','CCARD') AS PYMNT_METHOD_FLD, DECODE(BLC_PAYINFO_ADDITIONAL_FIELDS.FIELD_VALUE,'Visa','VISA') AS CC_CARD_TYPE, PYMT_TRNSCTN.DATE_CREATED AS TRANSACTION_DTTM, ABS(PYMT_TRNSCTN.AMT) AS TRANSACTION_AMT, DECODE(PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_AMT, NULL,0,PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_AMT) AS PAID_AMT_BSE, DECODE(PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_CRNCY_CDE,NULL,' ',PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_CRNCY_CDE) AS CURRENCY_CD_BSE, DECODE(PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_FGN_EXCHG_RT,NULL,0,PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_FGN_EXCHG_RT) AS FX_SPOT_RATE, PYMT_TRNSCTN.PYMT_TRNSCTN_ID AS PAY_TRANS_ID FROM BLC_ORDER, CFS_INTRFC_ORD, PYMT_TRNSCTN, ETS_CUST_LNKG, BLC_CUSTOMER, BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT, BLC_ADDRESS, ETS_ADR, BLC_COUNTRY, ETS_CNTRY, BLC_ORDER_ITEM, BLC_DISCRETE_ORDER_ITEM, ETS_SKU, PGM, ETS_DSCRT_ORD_ITM, BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM, VCHR_PYMT, WAIVE_FEE_DTL, BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL, BLC_ORDER_ITEM_DTL_ADJ, TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM_BKNG, BKNG, BLC_PAYINFO_ADDITIONAL_FIELDS, ETS_CUST WHERE CFS_INTRFC_ORD.ORD_ID = BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID AND PYMT_TRNSCTN.ORDER_ID = BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID AND ETS_CUST.CUSTOMER_ID =ETS_CUST_LNKG.CUSTOMER_ID AND BLC_ORDER.CUSTOMER_ID =ETS_CUST_LNKG.CUSTOMER_ID AND BLC_ORDER.CUSTOMER_ID =BLC_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_ID AND BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID =BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.ORDER_ID AND BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.ADDRESS_ID =BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_ID AND BLC_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_ID = ETS_ADR.ADDRESS_ID AND BLC_ADDRESS.COUNTRY =BLC_COUNTRY.ABBREVIATION AND BLC_COUNTRY.ABBREVIATION =ETS_CNTRY.CNTRY_CDE AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ID = BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID = BLC_DISCRETE_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID AND BLC_DISCRETE_ORDER_ITEM.SKU_ID =ETS_SKU.SKU_ID AND ETS_SKU.PGM_CDE =PGM.PGM_CDE AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID =ETS_DSCRT_ORD_ITM.ORDER_ITEM_ID AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID =BLC_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID =VCHR_PYMT.ORDER_ITEM_ID(+) AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID =WAIVE_FEE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID(+) AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID =BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_ID (+) AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL.ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL_ID=BLC_ORDER_ITEM_DTL_ADJ.ORDER_ITEM_PRICE_DTL_ID(+) AND BLC_ORDER_ITEM.ORDER_ITEM_ID =TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM_BKNG.ORDER_ITEM_ID (+) AND TST_DSCRT_ORD_ITM_BKNG.BKNG_ID = BKNG.BKNG_ID (+) AND BLC_ORDER_PAYMENT.PAYMENT_ID =BLC_PAYINFO_ADDITIONAL_FIELDS.PAYMENT_ID AND BLC_PAYINFO_ADDITIONAL_FIELDS.FIELD_NAME ='CARD_TYPE' AND BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID = ${Properties#orderNumber}
